When you get that (the endless dotting ....) it means that Heritrix failed
=
to start properly. It's usually worth checking the heritrix_out.log to see
=
what happened (if it exists).
 
You should try downloading the tar file min=
us the source (i.e. the one
without the "src" in the name -
<http://prdownl=
oads.sourceforge.net/archive-crawler/heritrix-1.4.0.tar.gz?do
wnload> herit=
rix-1.4.0.tar.gz ) and try again with that. The instructions
where aimed at=
 those builds and to be honest I've never even looked at the
contents of th=
e "src" builds as I check the source out straight from
SourceForge. If this=
 doesn't work and the heritrix_out.log doesn't offer any
insight, you may h=
ave discovered a new bug...
 
- Kris

I have downloaded the heritrix-1.4.0-src.tar.gz from SourceFo=
rge.net.
I installed heritrix by using the steps specified in Heritrix User=

Manual.   But when i am running the command 

% $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritri=
x --help

it is giving the output as follows

Tue Oct 25 16:49:00 IST 2005 =
Starting
heritrix..........................................................=
..........
....................

and many more dots without stopping.

Can =
anybody help me in understanding the problem
thanks in advance :-D 

With R=
egards,
Shadab
